arts.ttl: Serie A is back in Pisa, with Roma the visitors
arts.sum: On May 26, 1991 Pisa-Roma 0-1 (decisive goal by Muzzi) was Pisa`s last match in Serie A before last Sunday`s 1-1 draw in Bergamo, 34 years later. Pisa`s home matches resume where they left off, against the Giallorossi, 12,515 days later.

arts.ttl: AS Roma XI vs Pisa – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: AS Roma will aim to continue their promising start to the Serie A season with an away fixture against newly-promoted Pisa on Saturday. The Giallorossi travel to Tuscany after a solid opening to their campaign under Gian Piero Gasperini’s stewardship, looking to build momentum ahead of a crucial period. arts.ttl: Pisa vs AS Roma – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Pisa and AS Roma go head-to-head in Serie A on Saturday. Both sides will search for points in what promises to be an intriguing encounter, with newly-promoted Pisa facing an established top-flight opponent at home. Pisa vs AS Roma – Match preview and team news Date: 30th August, Saturday. Kick-off: 7:45pm BST. Venue: Giuseppe Collu.
